text: Hmingthanmawia also known as Valpuia (born 31 May 2000) is an Indian professional footballer who plays as a Center Back/Right Back for Mumbai City FChttps://us.soccerway.com/players/hmingthan-mawia/525467/ in the Indian Super League. ==Career== Born in Aizawl, Mizoram. Hmingthanmawia started playing football at the age of 8. After representing Mizoram in sub juniors, Hmingthanmawia was selected by Aizawl FC junior team. He was the main defender for junior team for two seasons. In September 2017, Hmingthanmawia was promoted to Aizawl F.C. senior team for Mizoram Premier League and I-League. ==I-League statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|League Cup !colspan="2"|Domestic Cup !colspan="2"|International !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="1"|Aizawl |2017–18 |I-League||12||0||—||—||0||0||—||—||12||0 |- |rowspan="1"|Aizawl |2018–19 |I-League||18||1||—||—||0||0||1||0||18||1 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !40!!1!!0!!0!!0!!0!!1!!0!!40!!1 |} ==References== == External links == * ZoFooty Profile.
